name: Rubber Master
description:
Best puzzle game of 2021! Be careful, Rubber Master is very easy to play but hard to master.
Highly addictive puzzle to test your skills. Navigate into the chaos and bring order!

Listen, here is how you can enjoy Rubber Master:
- Swipe or touch to rotate the sticks
- Feel free to experiment, so that all the colored rubbers are neat and clean!
- Once you untangle each and every rubber bands, you will be victorious!

Can you be the master of rubbers?
We’ll see!
